Reviews.Title: Description of Item is WRONG!
Reviews.Author: Rocky
Reviews.Content: This item says that it is a TOUCHSCREEN, has BLUETOOTH, and comes with 12 GB OF RAM.  None of those items are included in this notebook.  It has the standard 802.11 nag which does not have Bluetooth.  It is being advertised as having an 802.11 A/C with Bluetooth.  The notebook has 8gb of RAM and that's it.  The Screen is NOT a Touchscreen.

ProductInfo.Features:
Genuine Windows® 8 64; 4th Generation Intel Core i7-4700MQ Processor (2.4GHz, 6MB L3 Cache)
Intel HD Graphics 4600; Intel® 802.11 AC WLAN and Bluetooth® [2x2] 4.0 plus WiDi Support with Intel® Smart Connect Technology; Fingerprint Reader; 4 SuperSpeed USB 3.0; 1 HDMI; 1 RJ45; 1 headphone-out/microphone-in combo
ProductInfo.Name: Hp Envy 15t Quad Laptop | Intel Core I7 | Backlit Keyboard | Full Version of Microsoft Office Home and Student 2013 Comes Pre Loaded on the Computer. Processor & Memory: 4th Generation Intel® CoreTM I7-4700mq 2.4ghz 12gb Ddr3 System Memory (2 Dimm) Drives: 1tb 5400rpm Hard Drive No Internal DVD or Cd Drive Operating System:microsoft® Windows 8.1 (64-bit)
